verses.verse: <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H1413>gather<s%> yourself in <S%H1413>troops,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1416>troops:<s%> he has <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us: they shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H8199>judge<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> on the <S%H3895>cheek.<s%>

But you, <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> <S%H672>Ephratah,<s%> though you be <S%H6810>little<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> yet out of you shall he <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to me that is to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> whose <S%H4163>goings<s%> <S%H4163>forth<s%> have been from of <S%H6924>old,<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> will he <S%H5414>give<s%> them up, <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that she which <S%H3205>travails<s%> has <S%H3205>brought<s%> <S%H3205>forth:<s%> then the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> in the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H1347>majesty<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God;<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>abide:<s%> for <S%H6258>now<s%> shall he be <S%H1431>great<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> man shall be the <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> into our <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> he shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> in our <S%H759>palaces,<s%> then shall we <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H5257>principal<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

And they shall <S%H7489>waste<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrances<s%> thereof: thus shall he <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H935>comes<s%> into our <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H1869>treads<s%> within our <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as a <S%H2919>dew<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> on the <S%H6212>grass,<s%> that <S%H6960>tarries<s%> not for <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3176>waits<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

And the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> as a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> among the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> <S%H834>who,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> both <S%H7429>treads<s%> down, and <S%H2963>tears<s%> in pieces, and <S%H369>none<s%> can <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up on your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off your <S%H5483>horses<s%> out of the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you, and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> your <S%H4818>chariots:<s%>
And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H2040>throw<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4013>strong<s%> <S%H4013>holds:<s%>
And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more <S%H6049>soothsayers:<s%>

Your <S%H6456>graven<s%> <S%H4676>images<s%> also will I <S%H3772>cut<s%> off, and your <S%H4676>standing<s%> images out of the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you; and you shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
And I will <S%H5428>pluck<s%> up your <S%H842>groves<s%> out of the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you: so will I <S%H8045>destroy<s%> your <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H2534>fury<s%> on the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> such as they have not <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
